claims.object: Supply electrical power to plant's auxiliary systems

surface_layer.definition: A system designed to supply electrical power.
common_uses: Providing power in nuclear power plants

deep_layer.mechanism: Power is distributed from on-site and off-site power supplies to various components.
deep_layer.origin: Designed based on power requirements and safety standards.

examples: Electrical power system in a nuclear power plant

epistemic_metadata.source: PDF Design of electrical power systems for nuclear power plants
